headline.main: Korkut Takes Over as Leverkusen Coach Until Season's End
headline.print_headline: Korkut Takes Over as Leverkusen Coach Until Season's End

lead_paragraph: Bayer Leverkusen named Tayfun Korkut as their head coach until the end of the season on Monday, with the former Hanover 96 boss succeeding Roger Schmidt, who was sacked after Saturday's 6-2 demolition by Borussia Dortmund.
snippet: Bayer Leverkusen named Tayfun Korkut as their head coach until the end of the season on Monday, with the former Hanover 96 boss succeeding Roger Schmidt, who was sacked after Saturday's 6-2 demolition by Borussia Dortmund....
